name: Summarify â€“ AI-Powered Summarization Tool
description: Built a Flask-based web app leveraging Hugging-Face Transformers to generate concise, meaningful text summaries. Summarify offers a customizable, intuitive interface for efficient content distillation.

name: Hydro Squad
description: Created a dynamic platform for kitchen exhaust cleaning services using Next.js and TypeScript. Features include responsive design, integrated Google Maps, and a user-friendly quote request system.

name: Smart TreadMill
description: Redesigned a tradmill interface using Next.js and React to introduce interactive features such as virtual runs and workout presets, enchancing user engagement and accessibility.

name: Halifax Transit Real-Time Transit Data Fetcher
description: Developed an application that retrieves live transit data from Halifax Transit's GTFS open data feed, providing users with up-to-date public transit information.

name: World Dictionary
description: For one of my initial projects, I developed an interactive web application using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. This application showcases country-specific data, including population metrics and geographical details, with intuitive toggling features and seamless access to Wikipedia.

name: Knowledge Nexus
description: Developed an online bookstore with ASP.NET and C#. Knoweldge Nexus features responsive design, user-friendly navigation, customizable options, and secure checkout for a seamless shopping experience.

name: IMDB Explorer
description: Collaboratively developed a WPF app utilizing Entity Framework and LINQ to navigate IMDB data. This project includes multiple data views and custom filtering features with a refined UI theme.
